title: Why do Journalists even bother interviewing Actors/Actresses about movies they're in?
body:
Everyone knows that it's against the code of actors to bad mouth a movie you're starring in while it's in theaters, so what's the point? You know you're not going to get an honest response about the movie and it's quality from actors, so why bother even interviewing them?
